title: Proportion of the population living below the international poverty line by sex, age, employment status and geographic location (urban/rural)
rationale: Poverty ratio is socio-economic; LADM provides stable admin geographies for disaggregation and provenance only.

title: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line, by sex and age
rationale: Computed from national definitions; parcel/building geometry not required. Admin-unit linkage via LADM.

title: Proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions
rationale: Multidimensional poverty is socio-economic; LADM used for geographic disaggregation and traceability.

title: Proportion of population covered by social protection floors/systems, by sex, distinguishing children, unemployed persons, older persons, persons with disabilities, pregnant women, newborns, work-injury victims and the poor and the vulnerable
rationale: Coverage is socio-economic; LADM ensures consistent admin reporting units and provenance.

title: Proportion of population living in households with access to basic services
edgeCase: Could shift to Tier B in implementations tracking parcel-level service coverage and address↔parcel linkage.
rationale: Typically reported from surveys/administrative stats; parcel geometry optional unless service coverage is geocoded at address/parcel level.

title: Proportion of total adult population with secure tenure rights to land, (a) with legally recognized documentation, and (b) who perceive their rights to land as secure, by sex and type of tenure
rationale: Direct land administration indicator; rights/tenure and legal recognition are data-bearing in LADM.

title: Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
edgeCase: Tier B if exposure/damage computed at parcel/building/address level.
rationale: Usually reported at admin levels; LADM supports stable geographies and provenance; parcel detail optional.

title: Direct economic loss attributed to disasters in relation to global gross domestic product (GDP)
edgeCase: Tier B if asset losses are modeled/aggregated from parcel-level valuation and transactions.
rationale: Macro ratio; parcel linkage only needed for detailed loss modeling; otherwise admin-level reporting.

title: Number of countries that adopt and implement national disaster risk reduction strategies in line with the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction 2015–2030
rationale: Policy adoption metric; LADM only for country/admin referencing and provenance.

title: Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies
rationale: Admin-level policy implementation; LADM provides admin unit backbone and traceability.

title: Total official development assistance grants that focus on poverty reduction as a share of the recipient country’s gross national income
rationale: Financial ratio at national level; LADM for consistent country referencing.

title: Proportion of total government spending on essential services (education, health and social protection)
rationale: Budget composition metric; no parcel geometry needed, admin-unit disaggregation optional.

title: Pro-poor public social spending
rationale: Policy/fiscal metric; LADM used for admin referencing and auditability.

title: Prevalence of undernourishment
rationale: Beslenme yetersizliği göstergesi sosyo-ekonomiktir; LADM yalnızca idari kırılım ve izlenebilirlik sağlar.

title: Prevalence of moderate or severe food insecurity in the population, based on the Food Insecurity Experience Scale (FIES)
rationale: FIES anket temelli bir ölçüttür; parsel geometrisi gerekmez.

title: Prevalence of stunting (height for age <-2 standard deviation from the median of the World Health Organization (WHO) Child Growth Standards) among children under 5 years of age
rationale: Sağlık/anket tabanlı; coğrafi raporlama idari birim düzeyinde yapılır.

title: Prevalence of malnutrition (weight for height >+2 or <-2 standard deviation from the median of the WHO Child Growth Standards) among children under 5 years of age, by type (wasting and overweight)
rationale: Anket/klinik ölçümler; LADM yalnızca idari omurga ve provenans için kullanılır.

title: Prevalence of anaemia in women aged 15 to 49 years, by pregnancy status (percentage)
rationale: Sağlık göstergesi; parsel/bina geometrisi gerekmez.

title: Prevalence of minimum dietary diversity, by population group (children aged 6 to 23.9 months and non-pregnant women aged 15 to 49 years)
rationale: Beslenme çeşitliliği anketle ölçülür; LADM admin ayrıştırma sağlar.

title: Volume of production per labour unit by classes of farming/pastoral/forestry enterprise size
edgeCase: Tier B’ye kayabilir eğer üretim hacmi parsel bazlı ölçülüp LADM parsel kimlikleriyle toplanıyorsa.
rationale: Varsayılan uygulama idari düzeyde tarımsal istatistiklerdir; parsel verisi opsiyoneldir.

title: Average income of small-scale food producers, by sex and indigenous status
rationale: Gelir göstergesi; LADM sadece coğrafi referans ve izlenebilirlik için kullanılır.

title: Proportion of agricultural area under productive and sustainable agriculture
rationale: Payda tarımsal alan; pay ise sürdürülebilir uygulamalarla yönetilen parseller/alanlar. LADM parsel/alan geometrisini ve admin toplulaştırmayı sağlar.

title: Number of (a) plant and (b) animal genetic resources for food and agriculture secured in either medium- or long-term conservation facilities
rationale: Kurumsal/envanter esaslı bir metrik; mekânsal ayrıştırma ülke/idari düzeyde yapılır.

title: Proportion of local and transboundary breeds classified as being at risk of extinction
rationale: Soy/kırılganlık sınıflaması idari düzeyde raporlanır; parsel geometrisi gerektirmez.

title: The agriculture orientation index for government expenditures
rationale: Mali oran; LADM ülke/idari referans ve kanıt zinciri sağlar.

title: Total official flows (official development assistance plus other official flows) to the agriculture sector
rationale: Finansal akış; coğrafi ayrıştırma ülke bazında yapılır.

title: Agricultural export subsidies
rationale: Politika/gösterge; parsel geometrisi gerekmez.

title: Indicator of food price anomalies
rationale: Fiyat serileri/indeksler üzerinden hesaplanır; LADM idari düzeyde raporlama için kullanılır.

title: Maternal mortality ratio
rationale: Anne ölüm oranı idari/ulusal kayıtlardan hesaplanır; LADM idari omurga ve izlenebilirlik sağlar.

title: Proportion of births attended by skilled health personnel
rationale: Sağlık hizmeti kapsamı; parsel geometrisi gerekmez.

title: Under-5 mortality rate
rationale: İdari/anket tabanlı ölüm oranı; LADM coğrafi ayrıştırmayı standardize eder.

title: Neonatal mortality rate
rationale: İdari kayıtlardan; LADM yalnızca admin omurga.

title: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex, age and key populations
rationale: Hastalık sürveyansı; coğrafi raporlama admin birimler üzerinden.

title: Tuberculosis incidence per 100,000 population
rationale: İnsidans idari düzeyde yayınlanır; LADM referans sağlar.

title: Malaria incidence per 1,000 population
rationale: Sürveyans bazlı; parsel geometrisi gerekmez.

title: Hepatitis B incidence per 100,000 population
rationale: Laboratuvar/sürveyans verileri; LADM idari omurga.

title: Number of people requiring interventions against neglected tropical diseases
rationale: Program kapsama/ihtiyaç verileri; admin düzeyde raporlanır.

title: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease
rationale: Nedene özgü ölüm oranları idari düzeyde yayınlanır.

title: Suicide mortality rate
rationale: İdari/ulusal kayıt temelli; LADM admin omurgası üzerindeki ayrıştırma.

title: Coverage of treatment interventions (pharmacological, psychosocial and rehabilitation and aftercare services) for substance use disorders
rationale: Hizmet kapsama ölçütü; parsel geometrisi şart değil.

title: Alcohol per capita consumption (aged 15 years and older) within a calendar year in litres of pure alcohol
rationale: Tüketim göstergesi; idari düzeyde raporlanır.

title: Death rate due to road traffic injuries
edgeCase: Tier B’ye kayabilir eğer kaza noktaları/şebeke maruziyeti parsel/adres düzeyinde modellenirse.
rationale: Varsayılan raporlama admin düzeyde ölüm oranlarıdır.

title: Proportion of women of reproductive age (aged 15–49 years) who have their need for family planning satisfied with modern methods
rationale: Anket temelli üreme sağlığı göstergesi; LADM admin ayrıştırma sağlar.

title: Adolescent birth rate (aged 10–14 years; aged 15–19 years) per 1,000 women in that age group
rationale: İdari kayıt/anket; coğrafi raporlama admin birimler.

title: Coverage of essential health services
rationale: UHC kapsam endeksi; admin düzeyde derlenir.

title: Proportion of population with large household expenditures on health as a share of total household expenditure or income
rationale: Hane bütçe/harcama bazlı; parsel geometrisi gerekmez.

title: Mortality rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution
edgeCase: Parcel/adres bazlı maruziyet modellemesi yapılırsa Tier B.
rationale: Hava kalitesi modelleri/izleme ve ölüm verileri admin düzeyde birleştirilir.

title: Mortality rate attributed to unsafe water, unsafe sanitation and lack of hygiene (exposure to unsafe Water, Sanitation and Hygiene for All (WASH) services)
edgeCase: Parsel/adres bazlı hizmet kapsamı ve maruziyet modellemesi varsa Tier B mümkün.
rationale: WASH kapsama ve ölüm verileri admin ölçeklerde raporlanır.

title: Mortality rate attributed to unintentional poisoning
rationale: Nedene özgü ölüm; LADM admin referans sağlar.

title: Age-standardized prevalence of current tobacco use among persons aged 15 years and older
rationale: Anket tabanlı prevalans; parsel geometrisi kullanılmaz.

title: Proportion of the target population covered by all vaccines included in their national programme
rationale: Aşılama kapsamı idari düzeyde raporlanır.

title: Total net official development assistance to medical research and basic health sectors
rationale: Finansal akış; ülke düzeyinde raporlanır.

title: Health product access index
rationale: Endeks temelli; LADM ülke referansı sunar.

title: Health worker density and distribution
rationale: Sağlık insan gücü idari kırılımlarla raporlanır.

title: International Health Regulations (IHR) capacity and health emergency preparedness
rationale: Kapasite göstergesi; ülke düzeyinde raporlanır.

title: Percentage of bloodstream infections due to selected antimicrobial-resistant organisms
rationale: Laboratuvar sürveyansı; admin/küresel raporlama.

title: Proportion of children and young people (a) in grades 2/3; (b) at the end of primary; and (c) at the end of lower secondary achieving at least a minimum proficiency level in (i) reading and (ii) mathematics, by sex
edgeCase: Could shift to Tier B if school-level geocoded assessment results and school catchments are used.
rationale: Learning outcomes are compiled from assessments and reported at admin levels; LADM provides stable admin referencing and provenance.

title: Completion rate (primary education, lower secondary education, upper secondary education)
rationale: Completion is derived from enrolment/completion series; parcel geometry not required; LADM anchors admin disaggregation.

title: Proportion of children aged 24–59 months who are developmentally on track in health, learning and psychosocial well-being, by sex
rationale: Survey-based ECD metric; LADM used for geographic disaggregation and provenance.

title: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age), by sex
rationale: Participation drawn from EMIS/surveys; reported by admin units; LADM provides the spatial spine.

title: Participation rate of youth and adults in formal and non-formal education and training in the previous 12 months, by sex
rationale: Survey/administrative participation metric; LADM ensures consistent admin referencing.

title: Proportion of youth and adults with information and communications technology (ICT) skills, by type of skill
rationale: Survey-based skills metric; LADM used for geographic disaggregation.

title: Parity indices (female/male, rural/urban, bottom/top wealth quintile and others such as disability status, indigenous peoples and conflict-affected, as data become available) for all education indicators on this list that can be disaggregated
rationale: Derived parity ratios across disaggregations; LADM provides stable admin units for comparability.

title: Youth/adult literacy rate
rationale: Literacy rates are computed from censuses/surveys and reported by admin units; LADM anchors the geography.

title: Extent to which (i) global citizenship education and (ii) education for sustainable development are mainstreamed in (a) national education policies; (b) curricula; (c) teacher education; and (d) student assessment
rationale: Policy/mainstreaming inventory reported at national/admin levels; LADM ensures consistent country/admin referencing.

title: Proportion of schools offering basic services, by type of service
edgeCase: Tier B if geocoded school facilities are linked to parcels/building units and service availability is computed at facility/parcel level.
rationale: Facility coverage typically compiled administratively and reported by admin units; parcel/building linkage optional where facility points/parcels exist.

title: Volume of official development assistance flows for scholarships
rationale: Financial flows are compiled at country level; LADM provides country/admin referencing and provenance.

title: Proportion of teachers with the minimum required qualifications, by education level
rationale: Teacher qualification coverage reported by admin units; LADM anchors the geo-referencing and provenance.

title: Whether or not legal frameworks are in place to promote, enforce and monitor equality and non‑discrimination on the basis of sex
rationale: National legal/policy inventory; LADM only for country/admin referencing and provenance.

title: Proportion of ever-partnered women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to physical, sexual or psychological violence by a current or former intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by form of violence and by age
edgeCase: Could shift to Tier B if geocoded incident/microdata are aggregated via admin/parcel linkages.
rationale: Survey-based prevalence; reported at admin levels; no parcel geometry required.

title: Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence
edgeCase: Tier B if incident locations are geocoded and exposure contexts are modeled spatially.
rationale: Survey-based prevalence; LADM used for geographic disaggregation.

title: Proportion of women aged 20–24 years who were married or in a union before age 15 and before age 18
rationale: Survey-based child/early marriage metric; admin-level reporting via LADM spine.

title: Proportion of girls and women aged 15–49 years who have undergone female genital mutilation, by age
rationale: Survey-based health/social indicator; LADM for stable admin geographies.

title: Proportion of time spent on unpaid domestic and care work, by sex, age and location
edgeCase: Could shift to Tier B if diaries are geocoded to addresses and aggregated via parcel/admin linkages.
rationale: Time-use survey metric; parcel geometry not required.

title: Proportion of seats held by women in (a) national parliaments and (b) local governments
rationale: Administrative/political representation statistics; reported by country/local admin units.

title: Proportion of women in managerial positions
rationale: Labour market stat; LADM anchors admin disaggregation.

title: Proportion of women aged 15–49 years who make their own informed decisions regarding sexual relations, contraceptive use and reproductive health care
rationale: Survey-based autonomy metric; admin-level reporting.

title: Number of countries with laws and regulations that guarantee full and equal access to women and men aged 15 years and older to sexual and reproductive health care, information and education
rationale: Legal/policy inventory at national scale; LADM for consistent country referencing.

title: (a) Proportion of total agricultural population with ownership or secure rights over agricultural land, by sex; and (b) share of women among owners or rights-bearers of agricultural land, by type of tenure
rationale: Direct land administration indicator: tenure/rights and legal recognition are data‑bearing in LADM; sex‑disaggregation via LA_Party in disclosure‑controlled aggregates.

title: Proportion of countries where the legal framework (including customary law) guarantees women’s equal rights to land ownership and/or control
rationale: Legal framework assessment of land rights equality; LADM provides the rights taxonomy (RRR) and provenance links to sources.

title: Proportion of individuals who own a mobile telephone, by sex
rationale: Survey-based ICT ownership; reported at admin levels; parcel geometry not required.

title: Proportion of countries with systems to track and make public allocations for gender equality and women’s empowerment
rationale: PFM/policy systems inventory; LADM provides consistent country referencing and provenance.

title: Proportion of population using safely managed drinking water services
edgeCase: Tier B if geocoded service points and address↔parcel linkage enable parcel-level service status.
rationale: WASH kapsamı çoğunlukla anket/idarî kayıtlardan admin ölçekte raporlanır; parsel/adres düzeyi hizmet verisi varsa mekânsal olarak bağlanabilir.

title: Proportion of population using (a) safely managed sanitation services and (b) a hand-washing facility with soap and water
edgeCase: Tier B if household/service status is geocoded and linked to parcels/addresses.
rationale: Sanitasyon ve hijyen göstergeleri genelde admin ölçekte yayınlanır; geokodlu kapsam verileri varsa parsel tabanlı toplulaştırma yapılabilir.

title: Proportion of domestic and industrial wastewater flows safely treated
edgeCase: Tier B if treatment facilities and sewer catchments are geocoded and aggregated via LADM units.
rationale: Atıksu arıtma oranı çoğunlukla tesis/idari kayıtlarından türetilir; tesisler coğrafi olarak referanslanırsa mekânsal toplamalar yapılabilir.

title: Proportion of bodies of water with good ambient water quality
rationale: Su kütleleri (göl/nehir) temel geometridir; izleme istasyonları su kütlesine bağlanır ve sonuçlar admin birimlerinde raporlanır.

title: Change in water-use efficiency over time
edgeCase: Could shift to Tier B if computed by hydrological units/irrigation schemes as spatial units.
rationale: Sektörel verimlilik oranı ulusal/idarî düzeyde hesaplanır; havza/şema temelli uygulamalarda mekânsal birimlere bağlanabilir.

title: Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources
edgeCase: Tier B if computed and reported by hydrological basin units (basin polygons as SpatialUnitGroup).
rationale: Su stres oranı genelde ülke ölçeğinde raporlanır; havza temelli hesaplamalarla çevresel geometriye bağlanabilir.

title: Degree of integrated water resources management
rationale: Kurumsal/uygulama düzeyi endeks; ülke/idari ölçekte raporlanır.

title: Proportion of transboundary basin area with an operational arrangement for water cooperation
rationale: Transsınır havza alanı temel geometridir; ‘operational arrangement’ niteliğine göre havza alanları işaretlenir ve oran hesaplanır.

title: Change in the extent of water-related ecosystems over time
rationale: EO ve envanter verileriyle suyla ilişkili ekosistem alanları t ve t+n dönemlerinde ölçülür; admin birimlerde raporlanır.

title: Amount of water- and sanitation-related official development assistance that is part of a government-coordinated spending plan
rationale: Finansal akışlar ve hükümet planları ülke/idari düzeyde raporlanır; LADM tutarlı ülke referansı sağlar.

title: Proportion of local administrative units with established and operational policies and procedures for participation of local communities in water and sanitation management
rationale: Yerel yönetişim/politika göstergesi; idari birim düzeyinde raporlanır.

title: Proportion of population with access to electricity
edgeCase: Tier B if geocoded service points and address↔parcel linkage enable parcel-level electrification status.
rationale: Elektrik erişimi çoğunlukla anket/idarî kayıtlarla admin ölçekte raporlanır; geokodlu bağlantı verisi varsa parsel tabanlı toplulaştırma mümkündür.

title: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology
edgeCase: Tier B if household/connection data are geocoded to addresses and linked to parcels for spatial aggregation.
rationale: Temiz yakıt/teknoloji kullanımı anket tabanlıdır; idari düzeyde raporlanır; parsel bağlantısı opsiyoneldir.

title: Renewable energy share in the total final energy consumption
edgeCase: Tier B if plant-level geocoded capacity/production is aggregated via parcels/admin units.
rationale: Yenilenebilir payı enerji dengelerinden ulusal/idari ölçekte hesaplanır; varlık-temelli hesaplar için mekânsal toplulaştırma yapılabilir.

title: Energy intensity measured in terms of primary energy and GDP
rationale: Enerji yoğunluğu makro bir orandır ve ülke/idari ölçekte raporlanır; parsel geometrisi gerekmez.

title: International financial flows to developing countries in support of clean energy research and development and renewable energy production, including in hybrid systems
rationale: Uluslararası finans akışları ülke düzeyinde izlenir; LADM tutarlı ülke referansı ve kanıt zinciri sağlar.

title: Installed renewable energy-generating capacity in developing and developed countries (in watts per capita)
edgeCase: Tier B if plant/turbine/solar farm footprints are geocoded and linked to parcels for spatial roll-ups.
rationale: Kurulu güç genellikle ülke düzeyinde raporlanır; varlıkların geokodlanması durumunda parsel/idarî toplulaştırma mümkündür.

title: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita
rationale: Macroeconomic growth rate; computed from national accounts and population, reported at national/admin levels; no parcel geometry required.

title: Annual growth rate of real GDP per employed person
rationale: Labour productivity growth from GDP and employment; admin-level reporting via LADM spatial spine.

title: Proportion of informal employment in total employment, by sector and sex
rationale: Survey/administrative labour statistics; reported by admin units; parcel geometry not required.

title: Material footprint, material footprint per capita, and material footprint per GDP
edgeCase: Could shift to Tier B if MFAs are spatialized by regions/basins and linked to SpatialUnitGroups.
rationale: Economy-wide material flow accounts are compiled at national level; LADM supports consistent country/admin disaggregation where applicable.

title: Domestic material consumption, domestic material consumption per capita, and domestic material consumption per GDP
edgeCase: Tier B if DMC is compiled for subnational SpatialUnitGroups.
rationale: DMC indicators are macro accounts; LADM anchors admin-level reporting when subnational breakdowns exist.

title: Average hourly earnings of employees, by sex, age, occupation and persons with disabilities
rationale: Earnings statistics from surveys/admin data; reported by admin units.

title: Unemployment rate, by sex, age and persons with disabilities
rationale: Derived from LFS; admin-level reporting; no parcel geometry needed.

title: Proportion of youth (aged 15–24 years) not in education, employment or training
rationale: NEET rate from surveys/admin sources; reported by admin units.

title: Proportion and number of children aged 5–17 years engaged in child labour, by sex and age
rationale: Survey-based child labour metrics; reported at admin levels.

title: Fatal and non-fatal occupational injuries per 100,000 workers, by sex and migrant status
edgeCase: Could shift to Tier B if incident geocodes are linked to workplaces/addresses and aggregated spatially.
rationale: Occupational injury rates from admin/health data; admin-level reporting.

title: Level of national compliance with labour rights (freedom of association and collective bargaining) based on ILO textual sources and national legislation, by sex and migrant status
rationale: Textual/legal assessment reported at national level; LADM provides consistent country referencing.

title: Tourism direct GDP as a proportion of total GDP and in growth rate
edgeCase: Tier B if TSA components are compiled for subnational SpatialUnitGroups.
rationale: Tourism direct GDP is derived from TSA and national accounts; admin-level reporting.

title: Employed persons in the tourism industries
rationale: Employment in tourism industries from LFS/business registers; reported by admin units.

title: (a) Number of commercial bank branches per 100,000 adults and (b) number of automated teller machines (ATMs) per 100,000 adults
edgeCase: Tier B if geocoded branch/ATM points are linked to parcels/addresses and aggregated spatially.
rationale: Financial access infrastructure counts are compiled administratively and reported by admin units.

title: Proportion of adults (15 years and older) with an account at a bank or other financial institution or with a mobile-money-service provider
rationale: Account ownership is survey-based; admin-level reporting via LADM admin groups.

title: Aid for Trade commitments and disbursements
rationale: Financial flows tracked at country level; LADM ensures consistent country referencing.

title: Existence of a developed and operationalized national strategy for youth employment, as a distinct strategy or as part of a national employment strategy
rationale: Policy existence/operationalization metric; national/admin-level reporting.

title: Proportion of the rural population who live within 2 km of an all-season road
rationale: Erişim, tüm mevsim yol ağında oluşturulan tamponların nüfus gridleri/adres‑parsellerle kesiştirilmesiyle hesaplanır; sonuçlar idari birimlere toplanır.

title: Passenger and freight volumes, by mode of transport
edgeCase: Tier B if geocoded traffic counts, terminals/ports/airports or network links are spatially aggregated to LADM units.
rationale: Yolcu/yük hacimleri çoğunlukla idarî/ulusal istatistiklerden türetilir; mekânsal varlık düzeyinde çalışılırsa B’ye kayabilir.

title: Manufacturing value added as a proportion of GDP and per capita
rationale: Makro milli hesap göstergesi; ülke/idari düzeyde raporlanır.

title: Manufacturing employment as a proportion of total employment
rationale: İstihdam oranı idari/ulusal istatistiklerden; parsel geometrisi gerekmez.

title: Proportion of small-scale industries in total industry value added, based on (a) international classification and (b) national classifications
edgeCase: Tier B if firm‑level geocoded records are aggregated via admin/zone SpatialUnitGroups.
rationale: Katma değer payı ekonomi‑geniş hesaplardan türetilir; çoğunlukla idari düzeyde raporlanır.

title: Proportion of small-scale industries with a loan or line of credit
rationale: İşletme anketleri/kredi kayıtları; idari düzeyde yayınlanır.

title: CO2 emission per unit of value added
edgeCase: Tier B if facility‑level emissions (point sources) are geocoded and linked to industrial parcels/zones for spatial aggregation.
rationale: Çevresel‑ekonomik hesaplardan türetilen makro oran; ülke/idari raporlama.

title: Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP
rationale: Ar‑Ge harcaması / GSYH oranı; ulusal düzeyde raporlama.

title: Researchers (in full-time equivalent) per million inhabitants
rationale: Ar‑Ge personeli ve nüfus verilerinden oran; ülke/idari düzeyde.

title: Total official international support (official development assistance plus other official flows) to infrastructure
rationale: Altyapıya yönelik uluslararası destek akışları; ülke düzeyinde izlenir.

title: Proportion of medium and high-tech industry value added in total value added
rationale: Sektörel katma değer ve teknoloji yoğunluğu sınıflaması; idari/ulusal raporlama.

title: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology
rationale: Operatör kapsama katmanları nüfus gridiyle kesiştirilir; teknoloji bazında kapsama oranları idari birimlerde raporlanır.

title: Growth rates of household expenditure or income per capita among the bottom 40 per cent of the population and the total population
edgeCase: Tier B if household microdata are geocoded and aggregated to small areas/parcels.
rationale: Büyüme oranı hane anketlerinden ve fiyat endekslerinden türetilir; raporlama genelde idari ölçektedir.

title: Proportion of people living below 50 per cent of median income, by sex, age and persons with disabilities
edgeCase: Tier B if geocoded microdata enable small-area estimation linked to LADM units.
rationale: Göreli yoksulluk (medyan gelirin %50 altı) dağılım istatistiklerinden hesaplanır; idari düzeyde raporlanır.

title: Proportion of population reporting having personally felt discriminated against or harassed in the previous 12 months on the basis of a ground of discrimination prohibited under international human rights law
rationale: Algı/öz-bildirim anketleri; idari ölçekte yayınlanır.

title: Labour share of GDP
rationale: Emek payı milli hesaplardan türetilir; ülke/idari raporlama.

title: Redistributive impact of fiscal policy on the Gini index
rationale: Vergi/transfer öncesi-sonrası Gini farkı mikro veri ve idari kayıtlara dayanır; idari ölçekte raporlanır.

title: Financial Soundness Indicators
rationale: FSI göstergeleri finansal otoritelerce ülke düzeyinde yayımlanır.

title: Proportion of members and voting rights of developing countries in international organizations
rationale: Üyelik ve oy hakları kurum envanterlerinden; ülke düzeyinde raporlanır.

title: Recruitment cost borne by employee as a proportion of monthly income earned in country of destination
rationale: Gösterge göçmen anketlerine dayanır; koridor/ülke bazında raporlanır.

title: Proportion of countries with migration policies that facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people
rationale: Politika mevcudiyeti/değerlendirmesi ülke düzeyinde raporlanır.

title: Number of people who died or disappeared in the process of migration towards an international destination
edgeCase: Tier B if events are geocoded to route segments/border points and aggregated spatially.
rationale: Vaka sayıları genelde ülke/koridor bazında raporlanır; olaylar noktasal geokodlandığında mekânsal toplulaştırma yapılabilir.

title: Proportion of the population who are refugees, by country of origin
rationale: Mülteci payı UNHCR istatistikleri ve nüfus verilerinden; ülke kökenine göre raporlanır.

title: Proportion of tariff lines applied to imports from least developed countries and developing countries with zero-tariff
rationale: Gümrük verileri ülke ve ortak gruplar düzeyinde yayınlanır; parsel geometrisi gerekmez.

title: Total resource flows for development (e.g. official development assistance, foreign direct investment and other flows)
rationale: Kalkınma için kaynak akışları ülke düzeyinde izlenir ve raporlanır.

title: Proportion of urban population living in slums, informal settlements or inadequate housing
edgeCase: If only admin averages are available, treat as Tier C for reporting.
rationale: Slum/informal/inadequate housing often derived by intersecting built-up extents with settlement polygons and survey attributes; parcel/admin aggregation via LADM.

title: Proportion of population that has convenient access to public transport, by sex, age and persons with disabilities
rationale: Convenience access computed via network buffers/intersections with population or address/parcel units; aggregated to admin units.

title: Ratio of land consumption rate to population growth rate
rationale: Built-up expansion measured over comparable epochs and aggregated on LADM admin groups; paired with population growth.

title: Proportion of cities with a direct participation structure of civil society in urban planning and management that operate regularly and democratically
rationale: Institutional metric reported at city/admin level; LADM provides stable admin referencing and provenance.

title: Total per capita expenditure on the preservation, protection and conservation of all cultural and natural heritage, by source of funding (public, private), type of heritage (cultural, natural) and level of government (national, regional and local/municipal)
rationale: Fiscal/administrative accounting; parcel geometry not required; LADM for admin rollups and traceability.

title: Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
edgeCase: Tier B if parcel-level exposure/damage used.
rationale: Typically reported at admin levels; parcel detail optional for exposure modeling.

title: Direct economic loss attributed to disasters in relation to global gross domestic product (GDP)
edgeCase: Tier B if parcel asset losses modelled.
rationale: Macro ratio; LADM used for admin geographies and provenance only unless losses are modeled from parcel valuations.

title: (a) Damage to critical infrastructure and (b) number of disruptions to basic services, attributed to disasters
edgeCase: Tier C in survey-only regimes.
rationale: Infrastructure assets can be referenced spatially via parcels/units; outages/event logs linked and aggregated.

title: Proportion of municipal solid waste collected and managed in controlled facilities out of total municipal waste generated, by cities
edgeCase: Tier B if parcel/service coverage tracked.
rationale: Municipal service coverage commonly published at admin scales; parcel linkage optional if service points are geocoded.

title: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter (e.g. PM2.5 and PM10) in cities (population weighted)
edgeCase: Tier B if parcel-linked exposure.
rationale: Population-weighted air quality usually aggregated to admin units; parcel-linked exposure would shift to Tier B.

title: Average share of the built-up area of cities that is open space for public use for all, by sex, age and persons with disabilities
rationale: Open/public space share computed over built-up mask; access/legal qualifiers via RRR; aggregated by admin units.

title: Proportion of persons victim of non-sexual or sexual harassment, by sex, age, disability status and place of occurrence, in the previous 12 months
edgeCase: May shift to B in studies using parcel/building address exposure context.
rationale: Survey-based socio-economic metric; LADM for admin referencing and provenance.

title: Number of countries that have national urban policies or regional development plans that (a) respond to population dynamics; (b) ensure balanced territorial development; and (c) increase local fiscal space
rationale: Policy inventory at national scale; LADM for country referencing.

title: Number of cities and human settlements adopting and implementing integrated policies and plans towards inclusion, resource efficiency, mitigation and adaptation to climate change, resilience to disasters, and develop and implement, in line with the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction 2015-2030, holistic disaster risk management at all levels
rationale: Policy uptake metric; LADM ensures consistent referencing of cities/admin units.

title: Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies
rationale: Local DRR strategy implementation measured at admin unit scale; LADM for spatial spine and provenance.

title: Total official development assistance and other official flows in support of urban infrastructure or urban infrastructure projects, by sector
rationale: Financial flow tracking; LADM used for country/admin unit referencing.

title: Remittance costs as a proportion of the amount remitted
rationale: Havale maliyetleri koridor bazında izlenir; ülke veya koridor referansıyla raporlanır.

title: Number of countries developing, adopting or implementing policy instruments aimed at supporting the shift to sustainable consumption and production
rationale: Politika varlığını ölçer; ülke/idari düzeyde raporlanır, parsel geometrisi gerekmez.

title: Material footprint, material footprint per capita, and material footprint per GDP
edgeCase: Tier B, alt-ulusal MFA derlenip LADM idari gruplarına bağlanırsa.
rationale: Ekonomi-geniş kaynak kullanım hesaplarıdır; genelde ulusal raporlanır.

title: Domestic material consumption, domestic material consumption per capita, and domestic material consumption per GDP
edgeCase: Tier B, DMC alt-idari bölgelere ayrıştırılırsa.
rationale: DMC ulusal/idarî hesaplardan türetilir; parsel geometrisi gerektirmez.

title: (a) Food loss index and (b) food waste index
edgeCase: Tier B, atık/tesis verisi geokodlanıp LADM birimlerine mekânsal toplulaştırılırsa.
rationale: Kayıp/atık endeksleri anket/ölçüm temelli olup çoğunlukla ulusal/idarî düzeyde raporlanır.

title: Number of parties to international multilateral environmental agreements on hazardous waste, and other chemicals that meet their commitments and obligations in transmitting information as required by each relevant agreement
rationale: Sözleşmelere uyum/raporlama ölçütü; ülke düzeyinde sayısal değerlendirme.

title: (a) Hazardous waste generated per capita; and (b) proportion of hazardous waste treated, by type of treatment
edgeCase: Tier B, tesis/atık kaynakları geokodlanıp LADM birimleri üzerinden mekânsal olarak toplanırsa.
rationale: Tehlikeli atık üretimi/bertarafı idari/ulusal istatistiklerden; mekânsal varlık temelli uygulamalar opsiyoneldir.

title: National recycling rate, tons of material recycled
edgeCase: Tier B, geri kazanım tesisleri/aktarma merkezleri geokodlanıp toplulaştırılırsa.
rationale: Geri dönüşüm oranı belediye/ulusal atık istatistiklerinden; genelde idari düzeyde raporlanır.

title: Number of companies publishing sustainability reports
rationale: Kurumsal raporlama varlığı sayılır; ülke düzeyinde derlenir.

title: Number of countries implementing sustainable public procurement policies and action plans
rationale: Politika/eylem planı uygulama durumu; ülke düzeyinde değerlendirilir.

title: Extent to which (i) global citizenship education and (ii) education for sustainable development are mainstreamed in (a) national education policies; (b) curricula; (c) teacher education; and (d) student assessment
rationale: Eğitim sistemine anaakımlaştırma düzeyi; ülke/idari ölçekte raporlanır.

title: Installed renewable energy-generating capacity in developing and developed countries (in watts per capita)
edgeCase: Tier B, santral/türbin/güneş tarlası varlıkları geokodlanıp LADM birimlerine toplanırsa.
rationale: Kurulu güç genelde ülke düzeyinde raporlanır; varlık-geokod bağlantısı opsiyoneldir.

title: Implementation of standard accounting tools to monitor the economic and environmental aspects of tourism sustainability
edgeCase: Tier B, alt-ulusal MST/TSA uygulamaları LADM idari gruplarına bağlanırsa.
rationale: Standart muhasebe araçlarının benimsenme/uygulama durumu; ülke düzeyinde izlenir.

title: Amount of fossil-fuel subsidies (production and consumption) per unit of GDP
rationale: Fosil yakıt sübvansiyonu hesapları ve GSYH’den türetilen makro oran; ülke bazında raporlanır.

title: Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
edgeCase: Tier B if exposure/damage is computed at parcel/building/address level and aggregated via LADM units.
rationale: Usually reported at admin levels; LADM provides stable geographies and provenance.

title: Number of countries that adopt and implement national disaster risk reduction strategies in line with the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction 2015–2030
rationale: Policy adoption metric at national scale; LADM used for country referencing.

title: Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies
edgeCase: Tier B if local DRR implementation is assessed using geocoded assets/exposures aggregated to LADM admin units.
rationale: Admin-level policy implementation; LADM provides admin unit backbone and traceability.

title: Number of countries with nationally determined contributions, long-term strategies, national adaptation plans and adaptation communications, as reported to the UNFCCC secretariat
rationale: Submission/adoption status tallied by country; LADM used for country referencing and provenance.

title: Total greenhouse gas emissions per year
edgeCase: Tier B if facility-level emissions (point sources) are geocoded and spatially aggregated to LADM admin units or industrial zones.
rationale: Inventory totals are compiled nationally; parcel/asset geometry optional unless doing facility-based aggregation.

title: Extent to which (i) global citizenship education and (ii) education for sustainable development are mainstreamed in (a) national education policies; (b) curricula; (c) teacher education; and (d) student assessment
rationale: Education mainstreaming metric reported at national/admin levels; LADM ensures consistent referencing.

title: Amounts provided and mobilized (USD/year) in relation to the collective mobilization goal of the $100 billion commitment through to 2025
rationale: Climate finance amounts tracked at country level; LADM used for country/admin referencing and provenance.

title: Number of least developed countries and small island developing States with NDCs, long-term strategies, national adaptation plans and adaptation communications reported to the UNFCCC secretariat
rationale: Counts by country groups (LDCs/SIDS); LADM provides stable country/admin unit referencing.

title: (a) Index of coastal eutrophication; and (b) plastic debris density
edgeCase: If only national averages are reported without spatial aggregation, treat as Tier C.
rationale: Kıyı ötrofikasyon indeksleri ve plastik yoğunluğu kıyı şeritleri/buffer’lar üzerinde ölçülür ve idari birimlere toplanır; LADM admin grupları sabit omurga sağlar.

title: Number of countries using ecosystem-based approaches to managing marine areas
rationale: Politika/uygulama sayımı; ülke düzeyinde raporlanır.

title: Average marine acidity (pH) measured at agreed suite of representative sampling stations
edgeCase: Tier B if istasyon ölçümleri LADM’de tanımlı kıyı/marine zonlara mekânsal olarak toplanırsa.
rationale: pH ölçümleri noktasal istasyonlardan alınır ve tipik olarak idari ya da deniz alanı ölçeğinde özetlenir.

title: Proportion of fish stocks within biologically sustainable levels
edgeCase: Tier B if stock dağılım poligonları EEZ/deniz zonlarıyla mekânsal olarak eşleştirilip toplanırsa.
rationale: Stok sürdürülebilirliği değerlendirmeleri bölgesel/ulusal olarak yayınlanır; çoğunlukla mekânsal overlay’e ihtiyaç duyulmaz.

title: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas
rationale: Deniz korunan alan poligonlarının deniz alanları (ör. karasuları/EEZ) ile alan bazlı kesişimi; LADM admin grupları raporlamayı standardize eder.

title: Degree of implementation of international instruments aiming to combat illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing
rationale: Uygulama düzeyi/uyum değerlendirmesi ülke bazlıdır.

title: Sustainable fisheries as a proportion of GDP in SIDS, LDCs and all countries
rationale: Sürdürülebilir balıkçılık katma değeri/GSYH oranı; ulusal hesaplar ve ülke grupları üzerinden raporlanır.

title: Proportion of total research budget allocated to research in the field of marine technology
rationale: Ar-Ge bütçe payı; ülke düzeyinde mali veriyle izlenir.

title: Degree of application of a legal/regulatory/policy/institutional framework which recognizes and protects access rights for small-scale fisheries
edgeCase: Tier A/B if a marine cadastre extends LADM to model fishing access rights (LA_RRR) over marine SpatialUnitGroups.
rationale: Çerçevenin uygulanma düzeyi ülke/kurumsal değerlendirmedir; özel bir deniz kadastresi varsa haklar LADM RRR ile modellenebilir.

title: Number of countries making progress in ratifying, accepting and implementing through legal, policy and institutional frameworks, ocean-related instruments aligned with UNCLOS
rationale: Onay/uygulama ilerlemesi ülke bazında izlenir; LADM ülke/idarî referansı ve provenansı sağlar.

title: Forest area as a proportion of total land area
edgeCase: Tier C if only national aggregates are reported without spatial overlays.
rationale: Orman payı, orman maskesinin idari birimlerdeki araziyle alan-kesişimi üzerinden hesaplanır; LADM istikrarlı admin geometri sağlar, gerekirse parsel düzeyinde toplanır.

title: Proportion of important sites for terrestrial and freshwater biodiversity that are covered by protected areas, by ecosystem type
rationale: Önemli alanların (KBA) korunan alanlarla alan bazlı kesişimi; LADM admin grupları raporlamayı standardize eder, RRR koruma statüsünü ifade eder.

title: Progress towards sustainable forest management
edgeCase: Tier C if sub-göstergeler yalnızca ulusal toplamlar olarak raporlanıyorsa.
rationale: SFM bir bileşik endekstir (alan değişimi, biyokütle, koruma, planlı yönetim, sertifikasyon); mekânsal bileşenler admin birimlere toplanır.

title: Proportion of land that is degraded over total land area
rationale: Bozulma; arazi örtüsü, verimlilik ve toprak organik karbon katmanlarının alan temelli birleşimiyle hesaplanır; LADM parsel/admin omurgası sağlar.

title: Coverage by protected areas of important sites for mountain biodiversity
rationale: Dağ biyoçeşitliliği için önemli alanların korunan alanlarla kesişimi; sonuçlar admin birimlere toplanır.

title: (a) Mountain Green Cover Index and (b) proportion of degraded mountain land
rationale: Dağ alanı maskesi üzerinde yeşil örtü ve bozulma oranları hesaplanır; LADM admin grupları ile raporlanır.

title: Red List Index
rationale: RLI tür tehdit düzeylerindeki değişimi ülke/küresel ölçekte verir; parsel/alan geometrisi gerekmez.

title: Number of countries that have adopted legislative, administrative and policy frameworks to ensure fair and equitable sharing of benefits
rationale: ABS çerçevelerinin benimsenme durumu ülke düzeyinde izlenir.

title: Proportion of traded wildlife that was poached or illicitly trafficked
edgeCase: Tier B if seizures/events are geocoded to ports/border points and spatially aggregated.
rationale: Kaçak/kaçakçılık payı ticaret/elkoyma verilerine dayanır; tipik raporlama ülke/koridor düzeyindedir.

title: Proportion of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species
rationale: İstilacı türler için mevzuat ve kaynak tahsisi ülke düzeyinde değerlendirilir.

title: (a) Number of countries with GBF Target 14-aligned national targets and reported progress; and (b) integration of biodiversity into national accounting/reporting systems (SEEA)
rationale: Hedef uyumu ve hesap/raporlama entegrasyonu politika/kurumsal düzeyde izlenir.

title: (a) ODA on conservation/sustainable use of biodiversity; and (b) revenue generated and finance mobilized from biodiversity‑relevant economic instruments
rationale: Biyoçeşitlilikle ilgili finansal akışlar ve gelirler ülke bazında izlenir.

title: (a) ODA on conservation/sustainable use of biodiversity; and (b) revenue generated and finance mobilized from biodiversity‑relevant economic instruments
rationale: 15.a.1 ile aynı tanım ve veri kaynakları; ülke düzeyinde raporlanır.

title: Proportion of traded wildlife that was poached or illicitly trafficked
edgeCase: Tier B if geocoded events are spatially aggregated to LADM admin units or ports.
rationale: Ticaretteki yasa dışı pay; CITES/elkoyma verilerine dayanır ve genelde ülke/koridor bazında raporlanır.

title: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex and age
edgeCase: Tier B if homicide events are geocoded to addresses and spatially aggregated via LADM admin units.
rationale: Suç ve ölüm kayıtları idari düzeyde yayımlanır; LADM istikrarlı idari referans ve izlenebilirlik sağlar.

title: Conflict-related deaths per 100,000 population, by sex, age and cause
edgeCase: Tier B if events are geocoded and aggregated to LADM admin units or settlement polygons.
rationale: Çatışma kaynaklı ölümler çoğunlukla idari ölçekte raporlanır; mekânsal ayrıntı opsiyoneldir.

title: Proportion of population subjected to (a) physical violence, (b) psychological violence and/or (c) sexual violence in the previous 12 months
rationale: Mağduriyet anketleri idari birimlere ayrıştırılarak yayımlanır.

title: Proportion of population that feel safe walking alone around the area they live after dark
rationale: Algı göstergesi anket temellidir ve idari ölçeklerde raporlanır.

title: Proportion of children aged 1–17 years who experienced any physical punishment and/or psychological aggression by caregivers in the past month
rationale: Anket tabanlı; mekânsal ayrıştırma idari birimlerle yapılır.

title: Number of victims of human trafficking per 100,000 population, by sex, age and form of exploitation
edgeCase: Tier B if cases are geocoded to incident/rescue locations and aggregated via LADM units.
rationale: İnsan ticareti vakaları idari ölçekte derlenir; parsel geokodlama opsiyoneldir.

title: Proportion of young women and men aged 18–29 years who experienced sexual violence by age 18
rationale: Anket temelli prevalans; idari düzeylerde raporlanır.

title: Proportion of victims of (a) physical, (b) psychological and/or (c) sexual violence in the previous 12 months who reported their victimization to competent authorities or other officially recognized conflict resolution mechanisms
rationale: Raporlama davranışı anketlerden; coğrafi ayrıştırma idari birimlerle yapılır.

title: Unsentenced detainees as a proportion of overall prison population
rationale: Cezaevi/idari kayıt; parsel/bina geometrisi gerekmez.

title: Proportion of the population who have experienced a dispute in the past two years and who accessed a formal or informal dispute resolution mechanism, by type of mechanism
edgeCase: For land-related disputes specifically, LADM LA_Source/BAUnit can support thematic disaggregation, but the indicator scope is broader—keep Tier C.
rationale: Adalete erişim anket temelli; LADM idari omurga ve kanıt zinciri sağlar.

title: Total value of inward and outward illicit financial flows (in current United States dollars)
rationale: Makro finansal tahmin/hesap; ülke düzeyi raporlama.

title: Proportion of seized, found or surrendered arms whose illicit origin or context has been traced or established by a competent authority in line with international instruments
edgeCase: Tier B if seizures are geocoded to ports/points and aggregated via LADM admin units.
rationale: İz sürme/menşe tespiti oranı ülke bazında derlenir.

title: Proportion of persons who had at least one contact with a public official and who paid a bribe to a public official, or were asked for a bribe by those public officials, during the previous 12 months
rationale: Rüşvet deneyimi anketlerden; idari ayrıştırma LADM ile tutarlı yapılır.

title: Proportion of businesses that had at least one contact with a public official and that paid a bribe to a public official, or were asked for a bribe by those public officials during the previous 12 months
rationale: İşletme anketleri; coğrafi raporlama idari birimler üzerinden.

title: Primary government expenditures as a proportion of original approved budget, by sector (or by budget codes or similar)
rationale: Bütçe icrası/ödenek oranı; idari ölçekte mali kayıtlarla hesaplanır.

title: Proportion of population satisfied with their last experience of public services
rationale: Memnuniyet anket temelli; LADM idari omurga sunar.

title: Proportions of positions in national and local institutions, including (a) the legislatures; (b) the public service; and (c) the judiciary, compared to national distributions, by sex, age, persons with disabilities and population groups
rationale: Kadrolar ve dağılımlar idari düzeyde derlenir; LADM ile tutarlı raporlama yapılır.

title: Proportion of population who believe decision-making is inclusive and responsive, by sex, age, disability and population group
rationale: Algı temelli yönetişim göstergesi; idari raporlama.

title: Proportion of members and voting rights of developing countries in international organizations
rationale: Uluslararası kurum verileri ülke bazında özetlenir.

title: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority, by age
rationale: CRVS ve anket verileri idari düzeyde raporlanır.

title: Number of verified cases of killing, kidnapping, enforced disappearance, arbitrary detention and torture of journalists, associated media personnel, trade unionists and human rights advocates in the previous 12 months
edgeCase: Tier B if incidents are geocoded and aggregated via LADM admin units.
rationale: Doğrulanmış olay sayımı; ülke/idari düzeyde raporlanır.

title: Number of countries that adopt and implement constitutional, statutory and/or policy guarantees for public access to information
rationale: Hukuki/politika çerçevesi; ülke düzeyi gösterge.

title: Existence of independent national human rights institutions in compliance with the Paris Principles
rationale: Kurumsal statü ülke düzeyinde izlenir.

title: Proportion of population reporting having personally felt discriminated against or harassed in the previous 12 months on the basis of a ground of discrimination prohibited under international human rights law
rationale: Anket temelli ayrımcılık/rahatsızlık deneyimi; idari düzeyde raporlanır.

title: Total government revenue as a proportion of GDP, by source
rationale: Makro mali oran; ulusal/idarî ölçekte derlenir. LADM ülke/idari referans ve izlenebilirlik sağlar.

title: Proportion of domestic budget funded by domestic taxes
rationale: Bütçe/tahsilat verileri ülke düzeyinde raporlanır; parsel geometrisi gerekmez.

title: Net official development assistance, total and to least developed countries, as a proportion of OECD-DAC donors’ gross national income (GNI)
rationale: Bağışçı ülke bazlı oran; LADM yalnızca ülke referansı ve kanıt zinciri için kullanılır.

title: Additional financial resources mobilized for developing countries from multiple sources
rationale: Gelişmekte olan ülkelere yönelen ek finansal kaynaklar; ülke ve kaynak türü bazında izlenir.

title: Volume of remittances (USD) as a proportion of total GDP
rationale: Göçmen dövizleri/BOP ve GSYH serileri üzerinden makro oran; idari geometri için LADM kullanılır.

title: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods, services and primary income
rationale: Borç servisi ve ihracat göstergeleri makro ölçekte raporlanır.

title: Number of countries that adopt and implement investment promotion regimes for developing countries, including the least developed countries
rationale: Politika/kurumsal benimseme ölçütü; ülke düzeyinde izlenir.

title: Fixed broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants, by speed
edgeCase: Tier B if subscriptions or network coverage are geocoded to addresses/parcels and aggregated via LADM SpatialUnits.
rationale: Abonelikler genelde idari birim/sürat sınıfına göre yayınlanır; adres/parsel bazlı veri varsa mekânsal toplulaştırma yapılabilir.

title: Total amount of funding to promote development, transfer and diffusion of environmentally sound technologies
rationale: Teknoloji transferine yönelik finansal akışlar ülke bazında derlenir.

title: Proportion of individuals using the Internet
edgeCase: Tier B if household/adres bazlı kullanım verileri idari/parsel geometrilerine bağlanır.
rationale: Bireylerin internet kullanımı anket/tahminlerle idari ölçekte raporlanır.

title: Dollar value of official development assistance committed to developing countries
rationale: ODA taahhütleri alıcı ülke bazında yayımlanır.

title: Worldwide weighted tariff-average
rationale: Küresel ağırlıklı ortalama tarife; ülke/bölge düzeyinde hesaplanır.

title: Developing countries’ and least developed countries’ share of global exports
rationale: Küresel ihracat payı; ülke grupları düzeyinde hesaplanır.

title: Weighted average tariffs faced by developing countries, least developed countries and small island developing States
rationale: Uygulanan tarife ağırlıkları ülke grupları için hesaplanır.

title: Macroeconomic Dashboard
rationale: Bileşik makro gösterge seti; ülke düzeyinde özetlenir.

title: Number of countries with mechanisms in place to enhance policy coherence of sustainable development
rationale: Politika uyumu mekanizmaları ülke düzeyinde raporlanır.

title: Extent of use of country-owned results frameworks and planning tools by providers of development cooperation
rationale: Ülke-ait sonuç çerçevelerinin kullanım derecesi; işbirliği sağlayıcı/alıcı bazında ölçülür.

title: Number of countries reporting progress in multi-stakeholder development effectiveness monitoring frameworks
rationale: Çok-paydaşlı izleme çerçevelerinde ilerleme beyanı; ülke düzeyi bildirim.

title: Amount (USD) committed to public-private partnerships for infrastructure
edgeCase: Tier B if PPP projeleri proje alanlarına geokodlanıp LADM idari/parsel birimlerine toplulaştırılırsa.
rationale: PPP taahhütleri tipik olarak ülke/sector düzeyinde finansal toplamlar olarak raporlanır.

title: Statistical capacity indicators
rationale: İstatistiksel kapasite kompozit göstergeleri ülke düzeyinde yayınlanır.

title: Number of countries with national statistical legislation compliant with the Fundamental Principles of Official Statistics
rationale: Mevzuat uyumu ülke düzeyinde değerlendirilir.

title: Number of countries with a national statistical plan fully funded and under implementation, by source of funding
rationale: Ulusal istatistik planlarının finansman/uygulama durumu ülke düzeyinde izlenir.

title: Dollar value of all resources made available to strengthen statistical capacity in developing countries
rationale: İstatistik kapasite için sağlanan kaynaklar alıcı ülke düzeyinde toplanır.

title: Proportion of countries that (a) conducted at least one population and housing census in the last 10 years; and (b) achieved 100% birth registration and 80% death registration
rationale: Nüfus-konutu sayımı ve CRVS kapsama ölçütleri ülke düzeyinde izlenir.
